name: Rogue Planet (itch)
description:
you can travel through our stars in 3D space (Hipparcos, Yale Bright Star, and Gliese catalogs) by hopping between rogue planets.

press spacebar to ask for your target constellation, walk around your (tiny) rogue planet until you align the constellation to your zenith. sometimes it's on the back side of the planet.

when you align to the constellation, spacebar again to travel
